CodeList.Name: The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - Overall, how much of a problem has your urinary function been for you?
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - Which of the following best describes your urinary control?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: EPIC2-Pads or Adult Diapers per Day
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How many pads or adult diapers per day have you been using for urinary leakage?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: EPIC-CP - Adult Diapers Used per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has urinary dripping or leakage been for you?
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Pain or burning with urination.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: EPIC-CP - Pain or Burning With Urination

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Weak urine stream/incomplete bladder emptying.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: EPIC-CP - Weak Urine Stream or Incomplete Bladder Emptying

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Need to urinate frequently.
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Rectal pain or urgency of bowel movements.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: EPIC-CP - Rectal Pain or Urgency of Bowel Movements

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Increased frequency of your bowel movements.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: EPIC-CP - Increased Frequency of Bowel Movements

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Overall problems with your bowel habits.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: EPIC-CP - Overall Problems With Bowel Habits

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How would you rate your ability to reach orgasm (climax)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: EPIC-CP - Rate Ability to Reach Orgasm

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How would you describe the usual quality of your erections?
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - Overall, how much of a problem has your sexual function or lack of sexual function been for you?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: EPIC-CP - Problem Lack of Sexual Function

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Hot flashes or breast tenderness/enlargement.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: EPIC-CP - Hot Flashes or Breast Tenderness

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Feeling depressed.
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Lack of energy.
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - Urinary incontinence symptom score.
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - Urinary irritation/obstruction symptom score.
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - Bowel symptom score.
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - Sexual symptom score.
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - Vitality/hormonal symptom score.
Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice - Overall prostate cancer QOL score.

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire EPIC-CP Test Code Terminology
